review: This interface really failed me.  I switched from a Roku 2 (which I loved), because Amazon offered the Fire stick for free. It's not worth the free price tag!  I used it for 3 months, and it would fail all the time.  Programs would break up mid-play, with audio only, or crash and need to restart.  What a piece of junk.  I really gave it a chance, but have switched back to my Roku, which NEVER fails.
